conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a neo-noir movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
If you're in the mood for a classic neo-noir, I'd highly recommend "Kiss Kiss Bang Bang"! This 2005 film has all the right ingredients - a witty script, memorable characters, and a murder mystery that'll keep you guessing until the very end. Plus, Robert Downey Jr.'s charismatic performance as the private eye is simply fantastic.

If you're looking for something a bit more recent and perhaps a little darker, "Drive" might be the way to go! Ryan Gosling stars as a brooding stunt driver who moonlights as a getaway driver, and the film's atmospheric tension and haunting soundtrack will keep you on the edge of your seat.

conversation.text: I think I have just the movies for you! If you're looking for something with a similar neo-noir vibe, I'd recommend "Paradise Lost" - it's got a stranded reality show contestants-turned-killing-spree scenario that might scratch that itch. Or if you'd like to stick with a courtroom drama, "Find Me Guilty" is a great choice, starring Vin Diesel as the defense attorney who takes on the case of his life (no pun intended!).
